metadata.title: USN-6964-2 -- ORC vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-6964-1 fixed a vulnerability in ORC. This update provides the corresponding updates for Ubuntu 16.04 LTS and Ubuntu 18.04 LTS.  Original advisory details:   Noriko Totsuka discovered that ORC incorrectly handled certain  specially crafted files. An attacker could possibly use this issue  to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6964-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  liborc-0.4-0 - 1:0.4.28-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 liborc-0.4-dev - 1:0.4.28-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 liborc-0.4-dev-bin - 1:0.4.28-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 liborc-0.4-doc - 1:0.4.28-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
